long_description: Use this light and durable nylon footprint under your Mountain Hardwear Trango 3 tent to help protect its floor from abrasion and wear. Slightly smaller size than the tent floor helps prevent water from collecting under the tent in rainy weather. Webbing stake-outs at tent corners provide easy attachment.
short_description: Use this light and durable nylon footprint under your Mountain Hardwear Trango 3 tent to help protect its floor from abrasion and wear.
